p: As mentioned above, each peptide sequence was extracted as a numerical representation based on AAC, PseAAC, Am-PseAAC, DPC, and GDC called initial features. The parameters of PseAAC (weight 1 and lamda 1) and Am-PseAAC (weight 2 and lamda 2) were optimized by varying weight and lambda values from 0 to 1 and 1 to 10 with step sizes of 0.1 and 1, respectively, on the benchmark datasets T 544p+407n and T 544p+544n as assessed by a five-fold CV procedure. In this study, values of weight 1, weight 2, lamda 1, and lamda 2 as performed on the benchmark datasets T 544p+407n and T 544p+544n are (0.6, 0.1, 3, and 4) and (0.6, 0.2, 4, and 3), respectively. Meanwhile, the parameter of GDC feature ( g-gap) were optimized by choosing from one to five as assessed by a five-fold CV procedure. The optimum values of g on the benchmark datasets T 544p+407n and T 544p+544n are one and three, respectively.
